name: wcag-report-service
description: The G5 Website Accessibility Review Report identifies issues that may be limiting the accessibility and the performance of your website.
author: David Miller

scripts.docker:tag:prime: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker tag $npm_package_config_imageName $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch-$sha-prime
scripts.docker:tag:staging: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker tag $npm_package_config_imageName $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch-$sha
scripts.docker:push:staging: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker push $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch-$sha
scripts.docker:push:prime: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); docker push $npm_package_config_imageRepo:$branch-$sha-prime
scripts.helm:upgrade:staging: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); helm upgrade accessibility ./chart/ -f ./chart/opex-staging.yaml --set=image.tag=$branch-$sha
scripts.helm:upgrade:prime: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse $branch); helm upgrade accessibility ./chart/ -f ./chart/opex-prime.yaml --set=image.tag=$branch-$sha-prime
